name: mobile-camera-receptor
description: Professional real-time mobile camera streaming system for VJs and multimedia artists

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:bridge"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:bridge
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
